text: Greene ‚Äî a known QAnon conspiracy theorist who is the GOP frontrunner for a deep red House seat in Georgia ‚Äî has recorded hours of Facebook videos expressing racist, Islamophobia and anti-Semitic views https://t.co/Gp23fnbAAx

name: politico
text: The top three House GOP leaders, as well as the head of the party‚Äôs campaign arm, all denounced Greene‚Äôs rhetoric. House Minority Whip Steve Scalise (R-La.) and a slew of other Georgia Republicans came out in support of her GOP opponent in the runoff https://t.co/Gp23fnbAAx

name: politico
text: But members of the conservative House Freedom Caucus who previously endorsed her, including Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio), have not yet pulled their support for Greene, although they said they disagreed with her comments https://t.co/Gp23fnbAAx

name: politico
